      • getMovement

        public java.util.List<Move> getMovement(Position position,
                                        BoardState board)
        Calculates the movement of a piece on a given board for a given position and returns it as a list of moves. The method will not check if there is the correct piece on the given position, it will also ignore if the piece is pinned.
        Specified by:
        getMovement in class Piece
        Parameters:
        position - the position on which the piece stands
        board - the board on which the movement should be calculated
        Returns:
        a list of moves
